The correct answer is A: [00:01:59 - 00:02:28]. 

In this segment of the audio, the on-screen “MILDRED'S LANE Glossary of Terms” defines the word "hoosh." The female speaker then explains the concept of "critically engaging with every aspect of life," referring to it as a "practice" and mentioning that there's "a whole little hoosh within a hoosh." This segment occurs from 00:01:59 to 00:02:28 in the timeline provided.

The correct answer is C: [00:03:15 - 00:03:27]. In this segment, the speaker can be heard saying "I love bees. I've always loved bees. And so when we were designing the Grafter Shack, which is an homage to queen breeders and the art of queen bee grafting, we wanted to make sure that it felt like a home for bees." This indicates that a beekeeping suit is being shown during this time frame.
